alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 11:30AM CDT until May 08 at 9:34PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Steelville. Bourbeuse River at Union. Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Pacific. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Arnold. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Steelville. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Near this height, roads to the Lucky Clover campgrounds begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM CDT Friday was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 1 pm Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Meramec River Steelville 12.0 13.0 12.3 8.5 5.7 4.4 3.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
